print

public static void print(byte[][] input)

imput - The byte array to be printed

spacer

public static java.lang.String spacer(int input)
This method is used in the print 2d array to add spaces so all the lines line up. It is also used to add spaces after the first column / adds a max of two spaces.

Parameters:
input - An int for spacing
Returns:
The String of spaces determined by the input

spacer2

public static java.lang.String spacer2(int input)
This method is used in the print 2d array to add spaces so all the lines line up. It is also used to add spaces after all the data in the table and in the top row, and it adds a max a four spaces.

Parameters:
input - An int for spacing
Returns:
The String of spaces determined by the input

Parameters:

Returns:
The vector of bytes that represents the input

fromSingleArray

public static byte[][] fromSingleArray(byte[] input)
This method converts a 1-D byte vector into a 2-D byte array.

Parameters:
input - A 1-D byte array
Returns:
The 2-D byte array representation of the input
